text: tīrccayāyuṁ saphāyuṁ marvayuṁ matacihnaṅṅaḷāyi allāhu niścayiccatil peṭṭatākunnu. ka'abā mandirattil cenn hajjēā uṁṟaḥyēā nirvahikkunna ēteārāḷuṁ avayilūṭe pradakṣiṇaṁ naṭattunnatil kuṟṟameānnumilla. āreṅkiluṁ salkarm'maṁ svayaṁ sannad'dhanāyi ceyyukayāṇeṅkil tīrccayāyuṁ allāhu kr̥tajñanuṁ sarvvajñanumākunnu
